thread.title: BRIEF-Discover To Grant $1,000 Bonuses To More Than 15,000 Employees

title: BRIEF-Discover To Grant $1,000 Bonuses To More Than 15,000 Employees
text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Discover Financial Services:
* DISCOVER FURTHER INVESTS IN ITS WORKFORCE: RAISES HOURLY PAY; GRANTS $1,000 BONUSES TO MORE THAN 15,000 EMPLOYEES AS PART OF TAX RELIEF MEASURES
* DISCOVER FINANCIAL SERVICES - NEW MINIMUM RATE WILL TAKE EFFECT LATER THIS YEAR & ULTIMATELY WILL IMPACT MORE THAN 7,000 EMPLOYEES
* DISCOVER FINANCIAL - PLANS TO RAISE MINIMUM HOURLY PAY RATE TO $15.25 FOR ITS FULL-TIME U.S. EMPLOYEES AS A RESULT OF RECENT CORPORATE TAX REDUCTIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
